Segment.name: IN1
Segment.comment: To provide identification of an individual or entity

Field.name: EntityTypeQualifier
Field.comment: Code qualifying the type of entity

Field.name: NameTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of name

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: IndividualRelationshipCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the relationship between two individuals or entities

Field.name: LevelOfIndividualTestOrCourseCode
Field.comment: Code identifying level of course, test, or individual
